text: parayuka: "nan enikkutanne gunamea deasamea varuttan kaliyattavanan. allahu icchiccatumatram natakkunnu. enikk abhetika karyannal ariyumayirunnenkil niscayamayum nan enikkutanne alavarra nettannal kaivaruttumayirunnu. deasannal enne ottum badhikkumayirunnumilla. ennal nanearu munnariyippukaran matraman. visvasikkunna janattin subhavartta ariyikkunnavanum.â€
